reviews.review: Again, another amazing continuation of the series with a twist that puts you in a new world. Other than some audio problems, a really good game.

This game was really cool and beautiful when it came out, entering a hopeful city with many loose references to America. I really enjoyed the lighting effects at the start, the interesting storyline/references, and Elizabeth's interesting and well-done role as both a main character for the story, as well as a teammate helping out throughout the story.
Einfach wow. Ein Spiel mit Aussage.
Rollercoaster ride of emotions and concepts. The gfx can get a bit shonky with some odd blurring here and there but overall loads of fun if you like the Bioshock universe.
Super Spiel mit einer mitreiÃŸenden Geschichte.

Un excelente juego, la movilidad del personaje es demasiada algo que me gusta en este tipo de juegos. QuizÃ¡s llevar solo 2 armas es un poco limitante pero la variedad que hay da posibilidad a muchas combinaciones a llevar. Sin mencionar que la historia es espectacular y al terminarlo te deja en que pensar

BioShock Infinite, is possibly one of the best games around. It might not be the most ambitious, but all the pieces together will for sure wanting you to replay within ten minutes of staring at your screen after beating and just processing everything you just went through. Solid, solid story, that brings all the series together, and makes you want so much more. The game play is fantastic! Fans of the series will feel right at home with the tweaks and changes, but its very comfortable and easy to grasp right off the bat for anyone wanting to try out this masterpiece for the very first time. The music is amazing! Every fight feels dynamic and all of the locations you travel to, all feel and sound unique, The soundtrack really is killer! And than, of coarse, there is a hard mode, for when you just cant set it down after your fourth play through. It's brutal!

   BioShock Infinite, is fantastic! And I revisit every now and again just to remind myself why I fell in love with the series after playing it.   10/10

I first played BioShock Infinite way back when it first launched in 2013 on Xbox 360. To this day, it remains one of my favorite gaming experiences of my entire life. The combat is solid (especially on PC) and the story is one of a kind. I have since then completed the DLC which blew my mind. I couldn't recommend this game more, everyone needs to experience BioShock Infinite at least once.

Also Elizabeth has a nice smile.
This game has a very good story line.This is the best game in my mind

I buy "this" because it has very good reviews, but the game is very boring, shot everything that moves and eat junk food for 0.01% hp, plot pretend to be a very big thing but is mediocre at best, the protagonist is an asshole that pretend to be cool... Bloom, bloom everywhere... the game is full of poligonal glitches that are very annoying to play... Elizabeth and concept art (except the enemies of course) are the only good things. Waste of money.

A spectacular extension of the BioShock franchise. This must be the prettiest and most atmospherically perfect game I've ever played. It's nearly flawless. Highly recommend, even today!
The gameplay is a nice mixture of calmly looking everywhere for loot and shooting bad guys. The combat is fairly forgiving even for people who don't play FPS games like myself.

Base game was alright, ending sucked.

DLC was really unneccessary. Why did Elizabeth get herself killed like a little bitch. Why convolute the story with two DeWitts. Its just trying to answer questions no one asked, what a waste of time.

Me encanta, una obra de arte, me pase el juego hace unas semanas en dificultad normal explorando todo lo que pude pero me quede con ganas de mas, asi que me puse la dificultad 1999 y aqui estoy completandomela, la primera vez que lo juegas es una experiencia irrepetible, pero la segunda vez no te aburres no, la segunda vez es tambien genial ya que te vas fijando en todos los detalles y lo bien trabajado que esta el juego, uno de mis juegos favoritos sin duda.

Much more action-heavy than its predecessor. Story is equally impressive as is the world. Exploration has been toned down heavily. It's a lot of fun, and does something new with the franchise. Very impressed.
2020: if you haven't played it yet, it still holds up as a good single player experience.
Terrific game. Great story and combat. A must play

"Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt."

Bloody love this game. The subtleties made this game. How in the beginning when the lutece's are talking, and Robert tells her that he DOESN'T row. He doesn't mean that booker is physically incapable or rowing, he means there is no conceivable universe in which Booker rows the boat AND achieves his destiny. Such a great line.
this is a good game by itself, doesnt really feel like a bioshock game to me as i played through the game. a lot of the charm from the first two game kind of disappeared in this game

Incredible game, from start to finish.

I donÂ´t know... maybe i totally dont get this game. To me it seems lackluster and unwilling to tell a story (which i donÂ´t get at all). The gunplay is no fun, the enemys are impossible to locate unless they shoot at you and these tears make it hard to navigate through the levels. The scale of everything is kind of wrong (the enviroment seems to be to big). 

Had it in my library after a sale and played it for two hours some years ago. now during the covid "lockdown" i gave it a new try and i am kind of just working it off. 

Not for me i guess :D
